overview: "Music is a dream from which the veils have been lifted. It's not even the expression of a feeling, it's the feeling itself." This quote from Claude Debussy describes the musical world of this programme, made up of his own works and works by Maurice Ravel. In the choreography of Ravel's and Debussy's music by Jeroen Verbruggen and Sidi Larbi Cherkaoui, fluid lines, dream and atmosphere are strongly present.
tagline: Music is a dream from which the veils have been lifted. It's not even the expression of a feeling, it's the feeling itself.
title: Ma Mere L'Oye
